profile_positions.description:
I was a student researcher intern in the Health Technology Assessment session of the Public Health Department at Erasmus MC.

I was a contributing member of the BEST-COST research group during this time.

One of the primary projects I participated in was "Exploring the Relationship Between Long-term Exposure to Nitrogen Dioxide and Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease: A Systematic Review and Meta-analysis."

In this project, I assisted the BEST-COST research group in preparing to conduct a systematic review. Our objective was to investigate the relationship between long-term.
Exposure to nitrogen dioxide and chronic obstructive pulmonary disease incidence in patients. We also planned to perform a meta-analysis to understand the exposure-response function in the context of long-term nitrogen dioxide exposure.

I also attended many seminars about Sustainability in the green team at Erasmus MC.

At the same time, I am a member of the Public Health X(Formerly Twitter) team.
profile_positions.title: Research Student

profile_positions.description:
As a Stock Replenishment Associate, my primary responsibilities included ensuring all products were adequately stocked and neatly organised. Despite not being fluent in Dutch, I consistently demonstrated my ability to overcome language barriers and provide excellent customer service. I developed an effective communication approach that always allowed customers to find what they needed, thereby enhancing their shopping experience.
Not one to limit myself to assigned duties, I regularly looked for additional responsibilities, demonstrating my dedication to creating a well-organized and customer-centric environment. By actively engaging with customers and understanding their needs.

To further enhance customer experience and maintain a level of professionalism, I took it upon myself to proactively familiarize myself with the location of goods outside of my working hours. This strategy allows me to respond promptly to customer queries during my shifts. This commitment to time efficiency and informed assistance significantly boosted the positive shopping experience for all customers.
profile_positions.title: Shop Assistant

company.name: Hospital of Integrated Traditional and Western Medicine

profile_positions.company: Hospital of Integrated Traditional and Western Medicine
profile_positions.description:
As an Intern at the Hospital of Integrated Chinese and Western Medicine in Guangzhou, I embraced various roles that allowed me to provide comprehensive patient care. 

My internship was divided into two six-month segments: one in General Dentistry and the other in Orthodontics. During my Orthodontics rotation, I gained expertise in using mouth scanning technology and acquired an in-depth knowledge of dental materials. 

I also took on shifts at the front desk, providing support to patients. I also worked night shifts in the Emergency Department, enhancing my adaptability and skills in high-pressure situations. Outside of my regular duties, I took it upon myself to ensure the hygiene standards within the functional areas were met, including tasks such as refilling the sodium solution in a bacteria-free zone.

My activities extended beyond routine duties, as I volunteered for additional tasks such as teeth scaling and assisting in the Radiology Department, where I became proficient in X-ray diagnostics.
Committed to continuous learning, I regularly participated in seminars on medical devices used in dentistry, medical devices and oral drug regulations, enabling me to stay updated on the latest developments and guidelines in the dental field and further augmenting my practical knowledge. I held myself to the highest standards in patient care. I acted as a quality assurance assistant within my clinic, ensuring that all practices adhered to strict hygiene and professional protocols.

I also worked in a pediatric clinic. The clinic providing a stress-free and comfortable experience for younger patients. A standout aspect of their care was advanced technology, such as painless anaesthetics, significantly reducing anxiety.

Community engagement was another crucial aspect of my internship,  "Pit and Fissure Caries”, charity work in the local primary schools in my neighbourhood. This initiative was a profound experience, further broadening my public health knowledge.
profile_positions.title: Dentist

profile_positions.description:
Shortly after joining the company, I received the "Best Employee of the Month" award in September 2020, demonstrating my adaptation and strong work ethic. My duties encompassed direct interaction with customers interested in our lessons, from explaining the English and Portuguese testing systems to coordinating with teachers to arrange lesson plans.

In addition to this client-facing work, I also performed essential backend tasks, ensuring the smooth operation of our services. On the technical side, I played a crucial role in running checks with teachers and clients to provide high-quality lessons. I was also responsible for managing the inventory of the courses sold, demonstrating my competency in administrative duties and detail-oriented tasks.
In performing these responsibilities, Microsoft Excel and Word were instrumental tools. I utilised Excel for tracking and analysing inventory data, while Word helped me create and edit various administrative documents. 

As the Customer Service team leader, I took on additional responsibilities such as conducting training sessions and hosting meetings.

This role allowed me to guide and influence the development of our team, ensuring we maintained the highest standards of service. 

Navigating cultural differences posed a significant challenge in my role, but I addressed this effectively. Whenever customer complaints arose, I handled them professionally, drawing upon my knowledge of conflict and risk management. I followed up with customers, making sure that they were able to resolve issues and provide satisfaction. Also, I kept records of these complaints for future reference and continuous improvement.
profile_positions.title: Customer Service Officer

profile_positions.description:
My job is as an external planner and marketing officer. I undertook the task of creating and managing three WeChat groups, which included over 900 active users from Jinan University and its surrounding communities. This role allowed me to bridge communication among a large group of users and served as a crucial platform for promoting our services.

I engaged in regular brainstorming sessions to enhance sales strategies. These sessions often involved analyzing sales data to gain insights into our performance and consumer trends. Navigating cultural differences was a recurring theme in our discussions, reinforcing our commitment to an international community. We made a concerted effort to ensure English services were available to meet the diverse needs of our customers.

Furthermore, I was the one translating the shop's menu in their shop, making it accessible to a broader customer base. This task enhanced my cross-cultural communication skills and emphasized the importance of language inclusivity in business.

To further promote the shop, I organized sponsored events at Jinan University. This was a strategic move to foster connections with the local community and increase visibility. My work involved a significant amount of external coordination and management of these events, further developing my skills in community engagement and event management.
profile_positions.title: Head of Marketing Communications

profile_positions.description:
As an Tutor, my responsibilities extended beyond classroom instruction. I enriched my students' learning experience by integrating cultural knowledge into the curriculum and setting weekly homework assignments to reinforce the lessons. I also planned and executed new programs, such as preparation courses for the Hong Kong DSE examination.

Alongside teaching, I assisted with backend tasks including managing the WeChat Subscription Channel, where I posted new articles daily to engage our audience and promote the tutorial center.

Underpinning all my work was a strong commitment to quality assurance. I actively participated in shaping our teaching standards, aiming not just to meet Chinese national norms, but to exceed them by incorporating diverse educational standards. This pursuit of excellence extended to the recruitment process, where I interviewed prospective tutors to ensure they shared our high teaching standards and cultural understanding.

In a leadership role, I spearheaded a project promoting higher education opportunities in the Philippines. Drawing on personal experience assisting my brother with his Dentistry program application there, I was familiar with the process and recognized its potential benefits for other students. My efforts in this regard highlight my commitment to expanding educational opportunities and providing comprehensive guidance to students.
profile_positions.title: Tutor

profile_positions.description:
In my role as tutor in Kumon. We promote independent thinking among students. Instead of providing solutions in the first place, we encouraged them to navigate challenges and solve problems on their own, fostering critical thinking and problem-solving skills. This approach was supplemented with interactive activities such as Math games, including card and dice games, making learning more enjoyable and engaging.

In addition to teaching, I was responsible for assessing the student’s progress. I analyzed their results to determine the appropriate level for each student and graded their assignments, focusing on providing constructive feedback. When students encountered difficulties, I offered hints to guide them towards finding the solution, ensuring they learned the process rather than just the answer.

Moreover, I prioritised following up regularly with students in need, particularly those with impairments. It was a world to me that these students were given equal opportunities to learn and grow.
profile_positions.title: Tutor

volunteer_experiences.description:
My role extended to external tasks, where I was heavily involved in marketing and influencer activities through popular platforms like WeChat and QQ. My skills in this domain were recognized when I won the "Best Article" award at the Qixi Festival online event during my volunteering stint.

Part of my responsibilities also included careful monitoring and follow-up with individuals based on the severity of their mental state. Understanding the importance of delicacy in these situations, I paid close attention to the details and the language I used in my communications to ensure they were supportive and empathetic.

In addition to these tasks, I was responsible for creating weekly posts to engage our audience and encourage them to participate in the activities hosted by our association. This routine task required creativity and a good understanding of our audience's interests, further enhancing my skills in content creation and audience engagement.

In a unique role as a virtual befriender, I was paired with a resident in a nursing home to offer companionship and monitor their well-being. This task required a delicate balance between friendly interaction and mindful observation, especially concerning signs of dementia or other health concerns. Any observations made were reported to the nursing staff to make sure the resident received appropriate care.

However, the core of my role was to provide friendly conversation and emotional support. We engaged in casual chats monthly, creating a space for them to share their thoughts and experiences. This role emphasised empathy and active listening.

I translated business-related learning materials from English to Chinese for an e-learning website. This task required linguistic proficiency and a sound understanding of the subject matter. I needed to comprehend the nuances of the business concepts to provide the most accurate and effective translations.

This endeavour was more than a simple word-for-word translation; it involved interpreting and conveying the context and meaning of the content, ensuring it was comprehensible and engaging to the Chinese-speaking audience. Through this role, I honed my translation skills and deepened my understanding of various business topics.

As a member of the Twitter team for the Public Health department at Erasmus MC, my duties go beyond regular social media management. We are tasked with keeping our audience informed about the latest developments and happenings within our department. In addition, we play an educational role by promoting public health knowledge to our followers.

We take care to identify and retweet noteworthy content from other sources, ensuring our audience has access to a wide range of reliable and insightful public health information. This role has not only sharpened my skills in social media management but also deepened my understanding of public health and its importance in everyday life.

As part of the Teeth Care volunteer team at Jinan University's College of Dentistry, my role was both educational and service-oriented. Our primary activities included providing free dental checks to individuals on campus and within the neighbouring community, promoting oral health awareness, and organising informative seminars.

To improve oral health, we collaborated with local communities to extend our reach. This included conducting seminars in schools and other community centres, ensuring we could educate as many people as possible about the importance of good oral hygiene.

Within our university, we also ran campaigns targeting our fellow students, highlighting the significance of dental care as part of overall health and well-being. This experience deepened my understanding of oral health and honed my skills in community outreach and health promotion.

As a peer mental health counsellor, I played a sensitive and vital role in the student community. Every semester, I underwent mandatory training to equip myself with the knowledge and skills required for first-line intervention for students experiencing mental health difficulties.

An essential part of my role was identifying and escalating potential mental health concerns to the school authorities, always prioritising the students' well-being. I actively normalised the idea of therapy and mental health support, constantly advocating for its importance within the student body.

Recognising the delicate nature of my position, I entered into a confidentiality agreement with the students I supported. This reinforced their confidence in me as a safe and non-judgmental listener.

I also played a significant role in promoting the school's Well-being Center. By advertising their activities and services, I encouraged students to take an active interest in their mental health. As part of my commitment, I maintained regular follow-ups with some students. I encouraged them to engage in regular therapy sessions.
